title: Ticket #1731: OFFLINE_EXPIRE_ADS_AFTER
description:
Strangely, OFFLINE_EXPIRE_ADS_AFTER only has any effect if the ad is advertised via the command UPDATE_STARTD_AD_WITH_ACK and Offline is not set to true in the ad that is sent to the collector. The collector then sets Offline=true and overrides a bunch of other stuff too, including ClassAdLifetime.

This does not match the documented behavior.
remarks:
2011-Jan-27 14:50:47 by danb:
Bulk change of target version from v070505 to v070506 using ./ticket-target-mover.
2011-Feb-01 16:20:02 by tannenba:
Bulk change of target version from v070506 to NULL using ./ticket-target-mover.
creator: danb
